Name: Somewhere: Sect of Relic
About the game: Somewhere: Sect of Relic is a horror game that emphasizes first-person survival and problem solving. Somewhere: Sect of Relic will put players on edge like never before as they explore ominous and mysterious environments, the unknown awaiting them behind every corner. Somewhere: Sect of Relic is a horrific experience that will grip players from its opening thrills to its chilling denouement. Year 1990. A small provincial town . Hakan has been watching over the tranquility in the town for many years. One day everything went upside down. Hakan received a squeaky call by his wife. He tried to find his wife. Wandering down narrow roads he suddenly understood... It was the place where supernatural had been spilled. A sect had arrived in the city before him. What is it? Is it just a nightmare? Or reality? Will he be able to wake up? Will he find to his wife? What is the sect doing here? or Is there another power? Or all that is true?
